name: ACiD Productions
description: One of the most prolific and influential ANSI art groups of the early 90s BBS era, known for their high-quality ANS files and iCE color work.

name: iCE Advertisements
description: Rival to ACiD and pioneer of the iCE color extension that allowed 16 background colors in ANSI art.

name: Fire Art
description: Mid-90s group known for dramatic fantasy themes and large-scale ANS compositions.

name: Mistigris
description: Long-running textmode art group bridging the classic BBS era and modern textmode revival.

name: Blocktronics
description: Modern ANSI art collective producing artpacks that honor and extend the classic textmode tradition.
